title: Middle East Crisis: Polio Vaccinations in Gaza Are Beating Goals, W.H.O. Says
content: In its first two days, the campaign to vaccinate 640,000 Gazan children has been more successful than expected, a W.H.O. official said.
summary: In its first two days, the campaign to vaccinate 640,000 Gazan children has been more successful than expected, a W.H.O. official said.

title: Here are the latest developments.
content: Two ballistic missiles hit an educational institution and a neighboring hospital in Poltava, eastern Ukraine, President Volodymyr Zelensky said.
summary: Two ballistic missiles hit an educational institution and a neighboring hospital in Poltava, eastern Ukraine, President Volodymyr Zelensky said.

title: Maduro Declares Christmas in October in Venezuela
content: With the nation’s democracy in shambles, President Nicolás Maduro tries to inject some holiday cheer.
summary: With the nation’s democracy in shambles, President Nicolás Maduro tries to inject some holiday cheer.

title: At Least 12 Die Trying to Cross English Channel, French Authorities Say
content: The French maritime authorities said that 65 people were picked up from the sea after their vessel encountered unspecified difficulties.
summary: The French maritime authorities said that 65 people were picked up from the sea after their vessel encountered unspecified difficulties.

title: 129 Dead in Congo Prison Jailbreak
content: Inmates at the overcrowded Makala prison had sought to escape their suffocating cells after water and power went out. At least 129 were killed, some two dozen of them shot dead, the government said.
summary: Inmates at the overcrowded Makala prison had sought to escape their suffocating cells after water and power went out. At least 129 were killed, some two dozen of them shot dead, the government said.

content: The country has been hit by a wave of sexually explicit videos and pictures that have spread online, prompting the authorities to launch a sweeping investigation.
summary: The country has been hit by a wave of sexually explicit videos and pictures that have spread online, prompting the authorities to launch a sweeping investigation.

title: Pope Lands in Indonesia, Where Muslim-Christian Harmony Is Under Strain
content: Indonesia is proud of its religious diversity and its reputation for tolerance, but minorities, including Catholics, still face discrimination.
summary: Indonesia is proud of its religious diversity and its reputation for tolerance, but minorities, including Catholics, still face discrimination.

title: A U.K. Succession Drama: Who Will Replace U.S. Ambassador Karen Pierce?
content: Diplomat Karen Pierce has built alliances with Trump officials and the Biden-Harris administration. But with her term set to end next year, the U.K. government has a dilemma over her replacement.
summary: Diplomat Karen Pierce has built alliances with Trump officials and the Biden-Harris administration. But with her term set to end next year, the U.K. government has a dilemma over her replacement.

title: Netanyahu Stands Firm on Cease-Fire Terms Amid Growing Outrage in Israel

title: In a Kyiv Classroom, Cries for Help From Children Scarred by War
content: “They are like a bleeding wound, and no one sees it,” a schoolteacher said of her pupils, many of whom have fled frontline areas or lost family members in the fighting.
summary: “They are like a bleeding wound, and no one sees it,” a schoolteacher said of her pupils, many of whom have fled frontline areas or lost family members in the fighting.

title: Hamas Documents Reveal Tunnel Battle Strategy
content: Hamas leaders spent years developing an underground warfare plan. Records from the battlefield show the group’s preparations, including blast doors to protect against Israeli bombs and soldiers.
summary: Hamas leaders spent years developing an underground warfare plan. Records from the battlefield show the group’s preparations, including blast doors to protect against Israeli bombs and soldiers.

title: France Confronts Horror of Rape and Drugging Case as 51 Men Go on Trial
content: A man is accused of drugging his wife and then inviting dozens of men to rape her over almost a decade. The questions raised by the case have unsettled the country.
summary: A man is accused of drugging his wife and then inviting dozens of men to rape her over almost a decade. The questions raised by the case have unsettled the country.

title: The Olympian Rebecca Cheptegei Is Set on Fire in Gasoline Attack

summary: Rebecca Cheptegei, a long-distance runner who competed in the Olympic marathon in Paris, is in critical condition after a man poured gas on her and set her on fire, police in Kenya said.
